_header: But for because that dainty lo is lief
_description: The Food of Love, by Charles d’Orléans — three 8-line stanzas and 4-line Envoy

BLHar682.First Lines:
But for bi cause that deynte lo is leefWhich doth oft tyme the
                    grose mete sett aside…
BLHar682.Last Lines:
…But pardoun me that hit is lo so smallAt sum tyme if y mende
                    hit shall among
